new_app_features:
### Latest Features
- New animated stickers for more expressive communication.
- QR codes to easily add new contacts.
- Dark mode for a better user experience in low light.
- Group video calls with up to 8 participants.

application_information.description: WhatsApp Messenger is a popular messaging application that allows users to send text messages, voice messages, make voice and video calls, share images, documents, and other media files securely over the internet.
application_information.about_this_app:
# WhatsApp Messenger

WhatsApp Messenger is a popular messaging application owned by Meta Platforms. It enables users to send text messages, voice messages, make voice and video calls, share images, documents, user locations, and other media files securely over the internet using mobile data or Wi-Fi connections.

## Key Features:

- **Messaging**: Send text messages, voice messages, photos, videos, and documents to individuals or groups.

- **Voice and Video Calls**: Make high-quality voice and video calls to contacts worldwide.

- **End-to-End Encryption**: All messages and calls are secured with end-to-end encryption, ensuring privacy and security.

- **Group Chats**: Create and participate in group chats with friends, family, or colleagues.

- **Status Updates**: Share photos, videos, and text as status updates visible to selected contacts for 24 hours.

- **Media Sharing**: Share photos, videos, GIFs, documents, and user locations instantly.

- **WhatsApp Web**: Access WhatsApp on your computer's web browser to send and receive messages seamlessly.

For more information or support, visit the [WhatsApp Help Center](https://faq.whatsapp.com/) or contact WhatsApp support at [support@whatsapp.com](mailto:support@whatsapp.com).
application_information.required_os: Android 4.1> or iOS 10.0> or Web Browser
